title: Enhancing AI Practical Competencies: Constructivist VisChem for Molecular-Level Chemical Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can correct at least 80% of existing misconceptions about chemical phenomena after analyzing molecular-level animations.
Learners can visualize and explain new chemical reactions at the molecular level using the VisChem tool.
Learners can demonstrate molecular model application skills in at least three real-world cases (e.g., solution concentration changes, gas diffusion) through formative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
